Incredible game thats pace never lets up. I certainly hope its not too long until the final installment arrives. Its a brilliant game and one that is good enough to be replayed many times over.

Excelente! A mesma grandeza das edições anteriores!! Ótimos gráficos, mais monstros bizarros, mais tiroteios, quebra-cabeças, história perfeita e fácil jogabilidade. Half-Life 2, neste segundo episódio,prepara você para o início de uma nova era no PC: um marco na história dos jogos! É um episódio marcante, enfim, um jogo memorável! Assino e carimbo! Nota 10!!

Caution: beware of cliffhanger.

While "Episode One" was just more of what you saw in the third act of Half Life 2, Episode Two comes back stronger than ever with epic battles that never feel old and well-scripted interactions with lifelike characters. Each one of these games aims to be the most immersive experience you've ever had in a game, and Episode Two might just be the best at what it's doing.
..ever!

The best of the two episodes by a long shot. Immediately engaging from start to finish. Refreshing "woodsy" environment is a great change from the City 17 urban sprawl. You will join the many who can't wait for an Episode 3 fix by the time you finish.
A perfect sequel of the series! Great sequel of story! Best graphics of series. A very very excellent game yesterday, today and ever. More a time, Valve show how make a excellent game of ever!
Perfect expansion. Where is Ep 3?!
No matter how many entries Valve makes in the series, beating aliens to death with crowbars while being stalked by some wierdo in a suit is just as fun now as it was in 1998.
Awesome game!

Again it's a direct sequel of Episode One. Freeman and Alyx Vance are still on the hunt from the Combine. Fight your way through a new type of enemies called Hunters, but the strong point of Episode Two is the plot. You don't want to miss out on this.

It's shiny, it's Half-Life, and it's by Vavle. What more can you ask for?

If you are more into pretty environments then Episode 2 will easily make your day amongst the Half-Life series so far. With a smarter AI system and continuing the story of When Harry Met Sally, this game is one you would want to get. Why won't you want to if you liked Half-Life 2?
This is the second episode of the second game of the first half of the Life series.
I think this is the best out of the half lifes. This is my favorite. (hood speak) i tink dis is da best out ta da half lifes. DIS IS MAH FAVORITE!!
Un peu court et long à démarrer, ce sont bien la les deux seuls reproches que l'on peut adresser à ce jeu.

With an improved rendering engine, new environments and foes, Episode 2 easily tops everything that came before it. Every moment has been carefully laid out and the addition of... everything makes the game better. Achievements, the orange box or the continuation of the adventures of Freeman, Valve outdid themselves.

Where the FUCK is episode 3?

Jesus christ valve, your intention to release an episode every 6 months hasn't gone to plan has it.
Same as HL2 only with a +3. (+2 is for the flirty Alex)

So... what do I say about Episode Two? A crazy rollercoaster ride in storytelling and characters. The gameplay is great and Valve have included new ways to play the game (changes in combat etc and type of combat) while at the same time they tear you to pieces with the plot twists. I haven't felt so attached to some of these characters in a long time and for a video game to pull it off so well proves that EP2 is certainly one of the best, continuing the epic line started from HL2.

Trust me, there will be blood and many horrific and shocking moments in this game but once it ends your left begging for more. But it's been so many years and Valve has yet to deliver. Don't hold out for an episode 3, hold out for Half Life 3. 

Heh, HL3... the new "Duke Nukem Forever". Anyway, be sure that when you buy this game you play through it to the end and prepare for a shocking finale.
Holy fucking mother of god! Words can not describe!

If you don't know what HL2 is about, you've been living under a rock.

If you don't own it, buy it now.

+ Expansion aussi captivante et réussie que l'original
+ Batailles épiques et très originales
+ Ambiance magnifique 
+ Fin inoubliable

10/10 Shnapennhausen's Choice 2009

Hasonlóan rövid, de annál jobb ez a rész. Ismét tele jó ötletekkel, még jobb pályákkal. A történet és a hangulat nagyon jól el lett találva. Az új pálya / környezet változatos és még élvezetesebb. Ajánlom, ezt a részt soksor újra lehet játszani! Ha befejezték volna a sorozatot, kötelező darabnak mondanám...
Continue on as Gordon Freeman trying to rescue Earth from the Combine opression.  The best Episodic series which will continue on till Episode 3.
Só tenho uma coisa pra dizer: Jogue

Второй эпизод Великой Half-Life 2 оказался на голову выше не только первого эпизода, но и самого Half-Life 2. Имея те же технологии, что и при разработке второй части, Valve сотворили настоящее чудо. Браво, Valve!
「Half-Life 2: Episode One」の次作品。よくも悪くも前作の延長線だが、虫が苦手な人には絶対にオススメ出来ない。FPSとしては相変わらず面白くないが、タワーディフェンスと思えばこんなものかも。相変わらず伏線は多いがあまり回収されない。というかEP3まだですか？

Quite simply, an amazing game. The environments range from caves to open forest, and the story progresses more in this one than in Episode One. Try carrying the gnome on your second playthrough.

Half-Life 2: Episode 2 refines and nearly perfects the varied and interesting gameplay the Half-Life 2 brought to the table. Although not much longer than the inferior Half-Life 2: Episode 1, Episode 2 does much better to near the ideal balance of content, price and quality that Valves episodic structure should carry on to Episode 3. A must-have for all Half-Life fans, FPS fans, and pretty much any gamer. Although Half-Life 2 should really be experienced before playing Episode 2.

Episode 2 is bursting with wit, charm, beauty, emotion, and brilliance crammed together in a brief 5 hour experience matching, yet not really exceeding, that of Half-Life 2.
Melhor FPS ja inventado na minha opinião, Half-Life e incomparável...
Such a well crafted story that ends with a great cliffhanger. EP 3 SOON PLEASE VALVE!!! :(

If this is the jumping off point for Episode 3, it is going to be one hell of a wild ride :D
New allies, great game, nothing else to say. PERFECT!!

It is the best of all Half Life games. Can't wait for Episode 3 but get this if you haven't!

I am sure everyone has already played this who wants to, and most are looking forward to Episode Three. I must be a voice of dissent here and say how bored I was with this linear, repetitive and all-too-familiar game. Alyx and the rest of the characters are annoying as hell, apparently able only to spew the same few sentences in every single game. There was no "gosh wow" experience, no challenge and no point to the Achievements. Like being an extra in a B-movie.

Still I played the whole thing and got some enjoyment out of it. Nothing like the original, however.
Valve does a great job and brings us another piece of the puzzle. New environnment, new enemies, improved graphics and stunning gameplay. Can hardly wait for Half-Life 2 Episode Three.
ÜBER BRA!

More gorgeous and improved with HDR. Better than the original Half-Life 2, even gameplay and game mechanic are the same, it's never feel old or repetitive. Half-Life universe is expanded gracefully far beyond its predecessor with new environments, new vehicle, new enemies, and new weapon. Story plot is exciting and awesome. Score is beautiful and keep up with pace. The game end with cliffhanger and make you want more.
Best game of the Half-Life series.  I recommend it.
<3 halflife... best series evar >:U
La narrativa sigue siendo muy buena y se mantiene el suspenso, menos acción a mi parecer que en el episodio 1, y el final inesperado.

If you love Half Life 2 or shooting games in general, you should definitely get this game! The puzzles and gun fights are thrilling and clever, the graphics are top notch and atmospheric, the sound design is phenomenal, and the story is gripping. The ending is shocking, so shocking that Valve should hurry the fuck up with HL2: Ep 3 already!! >:O Highly recommend this game!

More challenge and more campaign to the Half Life 2 story, as the developers leave you wanting more, and never to have that desire satiated.

+ More Half-Life
+ More vehicular fun
+ Perhaps the most challenging segment of Half-Life 2 yet
+ New Combine enemies
+ More explosions
+ That awesome soundtrack returns
+ Intense from start to finish
+ You're satisfied until the game ends
+ GNOME

One word: Awesome especially when it comes to story telling, Half-Life 2 series has never been more critical in terms of progressing the plot. And to makes matter interesting, instead of having to fight endless waves of enemies, you are sometimes tasked with environmental puzzle solving matter with your gravity gun. A must have for all even if you are not a Half-Life 2 fan!
